articles.title: Explosions rock Ukraine's capital Kyiv as battle with Russian forces rages on in east - CBC News
articles.description: Russia said its missiles struck tanks sent from eastern Europe early Sunday in the first airstrikes on Ukraine's capital in more than a month, while a Ukrainian official denied military equipment was destroyed.
articles.content:

articles.title: KLM cancels all Saturday's flights from European destinations to Schiphol - The Star Online
articles.description: THE HAGUE, June 4 (Xinhua) -- Dutch airline KLM no longer transports passengers from European destinations to Schiphol for at least the whole day, the Dutch airline announced on Saturday.
